text: Tom Schilling (born 10 February 1982, Berlin) is a German television and movie actor. == Filmography == * 1996: Hallo, Onkel Doc! (TV series), episode: Manege frei * 1998: Der heiße Genuss (short movie) * 1999: Tatort (TV series), episode: Kinder der Gewalt * 1999: Schlaraffenland * 2000: Crazy * 2000: Der Himmel kann warten * 2001: Tatort (TV series), episode: Tot bist Du! * 2001: * 2002: Fetisch (short movie) * 2002: Mehmet (short movie) * 2002: Schlüsselkinder (short movie) * 2002: Weil ich gut bin * 2002: Weichei (short movie) * 2003: (Verschwende deine Jugend) * 2004: Agnes and His Brothers (Agnes und seine Brüder) * 2004: Egoshooter * 2004: Kurz – Der Film * 2004: Before the Fall (Napola – Elite für den Führer) * 2005: Die letzte Schlacht * 2005: Tatort (TV series), episode: Wo ist Max Gravert? * 2006: Einfache Leute * 2006: Atomised / The Elementary Particles (Elementarteilchen) * 2006: Der Feind im Inneren – Joy Division * 2006: Black Sheep * 2006: Wigald (short movie) * 2007: Pornorama * 2007: KDD – Kriminaldauerdienst (TV series) * 2007: Neben der Spur * 2007: Why Men Don't Listen and Women Can't Read Maps (Warum Männer nicht zuhören und Frauen schlecht einparken) * 2008: Robert Zimmermann Is Tangled Up in Love (Robert Zimmermann wundert sich über die Liebe) * 2008: Tatort (TV crime series), episode: Der frühe Abschied * 2008: Mordgeständnis * 2008: The Baader Meinhof Complex (theatrical movie, drama) * 2009: Dawn of Evil: Rise of the Reich (Mein Kampf), inspired by a stage play by George Tabori * 2009: Bloch (TV series), episode: Tod eines Freundes * 2009: Ken Follett's Eisfieber (German/Italian TV movie based on Ken Follett's novel Whiteout) * 2010: Tatort (TV series), episode: Am Ende des Tages * 2010: Ich, Ringo und das Tor zur Welt (TV biopic) * 2011: Polizeiruf 110 (TV series), episode: Die verlorene Tochter * 2011: Tatort (TV series), episode: Auskreuzung * 2012: Oh Boy! (theatrical movie, comedy/drama) * 2012: Ludwig II. (theatrical movie, period drama) * 2013: (TV mini-series) * 2013: Hai- Alarm am Müggelsee (theatrical movie, comedy) * 2013: Unsere Mütter, unsere Väter (TV mini-series) Also broadcast on BBC 2(UK) in April/May 2014 as Generation War. * 2014: Who Am I – No System is Safe * 2014: Posthumous * 2014: Suite Francaise * 2015: Woman in Gold * 2017: The Same Sky (TV Series), 6 episodes on Netflix ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Tom Schilling
